alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 10:21PM EDT until April 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches at elevations 1500 feet or greater in the southern Greens and northern Berkshires. Isolated amounts up to 6 inches are possible in the southern Greens. Winds could gust to greater than 50 miles per hour late tonight into Tuesday morning. * WHERE...In Vermont, Western Windham and Bennington Counties. In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may briefly be an inch per hour late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
